skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Say goodbye to fumbling with the light switch when you walk into a dark house with your hands full.
In order to use Amazon Alexa with Gantch products,you'll need a Gantch account.You can get it from WeChat Mini Programs.
1.Connect compatible products in the Gantch Smart Mini Programs.
2.Then,link your Gantch account to Alexa within the Alexa mobile app(Settings > Skills > Type in & search "Gantch Smart" > Select "Gantch Smart" > Select "Enable".)
3.Set individual names for each product.Then say,
"Alexa,turn on the office light."
"Alexa,turn on the living room curtain."
